title: _livecasino.io_

content: Hello dear BitcoinTalk Community!Another week, another amazing Promo from Livecasino.io!We heard that some of you like to play slots.So our Livecasino.io Promo for this weekend is for 50 free spins for Book of Dead by Playn’Go!!!Livecasino.io BitcoinTalk Promo #18 will work like this:Reward50 free spins (0.4 USDT each) for Book of Dead slots gameHow?Opt-in by sending  PM with your livecasino.io username (please use BitcoinTalk promo #18 as PM subject to facilitate the management)Make at least 1 deposit, during campaign periodWager at least 5 mBTC on any Slots games on Livecasino.io!Promo durationThis Promo will be running from the moment of this post, until Sunday 5th June 23:59 GMTRulesThe reward will be credited to the livecasino.io accounts on Monday 6th June, 17:00 GMTAll bets and winnings will be withdrawable from the freespinsNormal livecasino.io terms and conditions still applyDue to Game Providers country restrictions, some participants may have to receive a different, but equivalent, rewardWe hope you enjoy!Flávio from livecasino.io team
